title: Paul Hicks (rugby league)
text: Paul Hicks (born 22 June 1977) is an English former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1990s and 2000s. He played at club level for <a href="Normanton%20%28rugby%20league%29">Normanton</a>, <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity (Wildcats)</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Wakefield%20Trinity%20players">Heritage No. 1071</a>, <a href="Batley%20Bulldogs">Batley Bulldogs</a>, and <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a>, as a .
